title: SafeSphere
description: Full‑stack MERN SaaS for incident reporting, observation logging, MOC (Management of Change), and meeting records with org‑level customization.
responsibilities: Implemented role‑based access control and secure report storage
Built CSV‑based user onboarding for organizations
Delivered organization‑level configuration and multi‑tenant flows

title: Hartzell Helios (Signia Aerospace)
description: Sub‑project to centralize and manage critical records across operations with secure access and advanced search.
responsibilities: Designed secure document management and data categorization
Implemented role‑based access and advanced search capabilities
Integrated AWS S3 for durable document storage

title: PadelPro – Sports Booking & Management
description: Multi‑role SaaS for Padel clubs enabling super admin, club admins, and players to manage bookings, memberships, and payments.
responsibilities: Built super admin panel for club registration, plans, holidays, and dynamic pricing
Implemented club admin dashboard for player/court management and memberships
Delivered player app for slot booking, booking modifications, and split/single payments
Designed payment workflows and end‑to‑end RESTful APIs
